hymn.title: Our Heart
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—The Proper Heart
hymn.notes: 2013 Memorial Day Weekend Conference, Message 3 Point VII (A)

layout.singingstanza: Our heart is the to -- tal -- i -- ty of our [skip1] in -- ward parts, the cen -- ter of our in -- ward being, and our rep -- re -- sen -- ta -- tive with re -- gard to our in -- cli -- na -- tion, af -- fec -- tion, de -- light and de -- sire; thus, when Christ makes His home in our hearts, He con -- trols our en -- tire in -- ward being and sup -- plies and strength -- ens ev -- ery in -- ward part with Him -- self.

lyrics.stanza: Our heart is the totality of our inward parts, The center of our inward being, and our representative With regard to our inclination, affection, delight and desire; Thus, when Christ makes His home in our hearts, He controls our entire inward being And supplies and strengthens every inward part with Himself.
